3151979912878712042.Text: You have my thanks, and the thanks of Variner's family, and his spirit, and all the victims of the Black Dart Gang.

13713322272732317010.Text: They're... dead? You killed them? You killed the Black Dart Gang? It's... a miracle. Here. Please. Take this. Variner gave it to me -- it belonged to his family. I'm sure they all would want you to have it. You have my thanks, and the thanks of Variner's family, and his spirit, and all the victims of the Black Dart Gang.

20359212604223436.Text: If only I could see Variner's ghost, and speak with him... perhaps that could put him to rest. But I can't go any further down here. It's just too dangerous.

8323260822834330375.Text: Be careful. The Black Dart Gang are very dangerous. But if you see Variner's ghost, speak to him. Perhaps you can bring me his message.

3192197833147316026.Text: You're right, I'm sure. I don't know why I come down here. If only I could see Variner's ghost, and speak with him... perhaps that could put him to rest. But I can't go any further down here. It's just too dangerous.

20815294742039812454.Text: [She looks you over carefully.] I'm not sure. I've never seen anyone quite like you before... But I'm not sure you are a match for the Black Dart Gang. They dress like poor beggars, but they throw deadly poison darts -- one is enough to kill you. If you run into them, makes sure you have many cure poison and dispel potions. And if you see Variner's ghost, speak to him. Perhaps you can bring me his message.

9773239713155812032.Text: [She looks you over carefully.] I don't know. I don't think you'd stand a chance against the Black Dart Gang. They dress like poor beggars, but they throw deadly poison darts -- one is enough to kill you. If you see them, run. But if you see Variner's ghost, speak to him. Perhaps you can bring me his message.

225743090911645051.Text: [She looks you over carefully.] You'll have no chance against them in a fight. They dress like poor beggars, but they throw deadly poison darts -- one is enough to kill you. If you see them, run. But if you see Variner's ghost, speak to him. Perhaps you can bring me his message.

2999895793137010807.Text: They ambushed my lover and me in the Temple Sewers. Variner held them off while I ran. When I turned to look back, Variner was down. I just kept running. Now Variner's ghost comes to me at night, begging me to come to him, to rescue him. He says he has a message for me... but I can't go down there. I can't face the Black Dart Gang. Variner was a great fighter, but with one dart, he was dead in seconds. They'd kill me for sure.
Script: Choice "I'm sorry. Can I help?" 1 "Variner is dead. There's nothing you can do." 2

95401651679049053.Text: They're deadly. They look like harmless beggars, and they hang out in the sewers, waiting to ambush some careless adventurer struggling out of the ruins loaded with loot. They use darts -- deadly poisons, enchantments, I don't know -- never heard of anything so evil. If you see one, you better run, fast, and carry cure poison and dispel potions.
